items.name: The Rick and Morty Book: Deluxe Edition
items.description: A comprehensive guide to the show, featuring behind-the-scenes information, concept art, and more.

items.name: The Art of Rick and Morty
items.description: A book showcasing the artwork and creative process behind the show.

items.name: Rick and Morty and Philosophy: In the Darkest Timeline
items.description: A collection of essays exploring philosophical concepts through the lens of the show.

items.name: The Science of Rick and Morty: What Earth's Stupidest Show Can Teach Us About Quantum Physics, Biological Hacking, and Reality Itself
items.description: A book that delves into the scientific ideas presented in the series.

items.name: Rick and Morty: Lil' Poopy Superstar
items.description: A graphic novel that follows Summer Smith and her new alien friend, in a separate adventure from the show.

items.name: Rick and Morty (Oni Press)
items.description: The official comic series that continues the adventures of Rick and Morty across various dimensions and timelines.

items.name: Rick and Morty vs. Dungeons & Dragons
items.description: A crossover comic series that sees the characters playing the popular tabletop game.

items.name: Rick and Morty: Pocket Like You Stole It
items.description: A miniseries where Rick and Morty enter a virtual reality video game.

items.name: Rick and Morty Presents
items.description: A series of one-shot comics focusing on side characters and alternate realities.

items.name: Rick and Morty: Ever After
items.description: A comic book that explores the aftermath of a crazy adventure.
